title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: West Barnstable Conservation Area – Cape Cod, Massachusetts
content:
Photo submitted by Jeff Wdow, “The single track in the West Barnstable Conservation Area on Cape Cod, Massachusetts, apparently was named Trail of Tears by the very first mountain bikers to ride it. But the 21 miles of single track inspire mostly smiles these days. I’ve had my Scott Spark RC 900 Pro for almost two

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: West Barnstable Conservation Area – Cape Cod, Massachusetts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
